channel.title: [PI] How to open another players bank / inventory?

item.title: [PI] How to open another players bank / inventory?
item.dc:creator: @gigabyt3r gigabyt3r
item.description:
@gigabyt3r wrote:

This is the code I have but it just opens my bank up and the other persons own bank as well

if (playerCommand.startsWith("obank")) { String playersBank = playerCommand.substring(6); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playersBank)) { Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; p.getPA().openUpBank(); Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; } } } }

Does anyone know how to do this??

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to open another players bank / inventory?
